Package com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.component.impl

Provides the abstract implementations of the data access component interfaces.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDataAccessComponent<T extends Resource>
    An abstract implementation that manages resources for both types of Data Access Component.
    AbstractReadableDataAccessComponent<T,U,V,W,T1 extends Resource>
    The AbstractReadableDataAccessComponent class is an abstract implementation of a ReadableDataAccessComponent.
    AbstractWritableDataAccessComponent<T,T1 extends Resource>
    An abstract implementation of the WritableDataAccessComponent
    ReadableDynamoDBDataAccessComponentImpl<T>
    The ReadableDynamoDBDataAccessComponentImpl class is an implementation of ReadableDataAccessComponent that uses Dynamo DB to retrieve persistent data.
    ReadableHibernateDataAccessComponentImpl<T>
    The ReadableHibernateDataAccessComponentImpl class is an implementation of ReadableDataAccessComponent that uses hibernate to retrieve persistent data.
    WritableDynamoDBDataAccessComponentImpl<T>
    The WritableDynamoDBDataAccessComponentImpl class is an implementation of WritableDataAccessComponent that uses AWS dynamo DB to store persistent data.
    WritableHibernateDataAccessComponentImpl<T>
    The WritableHibernateDataAccessComponentImpl class is an implementation of WritableDataAccessComponent that uses hibernate to store persistent data.

Package com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.component.impl Description

Provides the abstract implementations of the data access component interfaces.
